con:testCase.name: SOPeriodicVALItoREJECTED
con:testCase.con:description:
Standing Order - Periodic - PM Payment
Validated to Active Check

con:request.name: SO Create
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5" xmlns:urn1="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5" xmlns:urn2="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:creditor:v1_5"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${#TestSuite#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PAYS</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>NBA</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>4201</wsc:orgid> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="INT"/> <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="${=java.util.UUID.randomUUID()}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:standingOrderCreateRequest> <urn:standingOrder> <urn1:recurrence>WEEKLY</urn1:recurrence> <urn1:dueDates> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <urn1:dueDate>${Properties#DueDate}</urn1:dueDate> </urn1:dueDates> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn1:bankHolidayAdjustment>BEFORE</urn1:bankHolidayAdjustment> <urn1:exemptions> <urn1:exemption> <urn1:startDate>${Properties#ExceptionStartDate}</urn1:startDate> <urn1:endDate>${Properties#ExceptionEndDate}</urn1:endDate> <urn1:recurring>false</urn1:recurring> <urn1:description>DescriptionOneExemption</urn1:description> </urn1:exemption> </urn1:exemptions> <urn1:paymentInfo> <urn3:debtorAccount xmlns:urn3="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:debtor:v1_5"> <urn4:identification xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">${Properties#accountNumber}</urn4:identification> <urn4:currency xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">${Properties#currencyCode}</urn4:currency> </urn3:debtorAccount> </urn1:paymentInfo> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <urn1:transaction> <urn2:amount> <urn3:instructedAmount currency="${Properties#currencyCode}" xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7"> <urn3:amount>${Properties#Amount}</urn3:amount> </urn3:instructedAmount> </urn2:amount> <urn2:chargeBearer>SHAR</urn2:chargeBearer> <urn2:creditorAgent> <urn3:bic xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">${Properties#CreditorAgent}</urn3:bic> <urn3:postalAddress xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7"> <urn3:postCode>4502</urn3:postCode> <urn3:townName>test</urn3:townName> <urn3:countrySubDivision>testing</urn3:countrySubDivision> <urn3:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn3:country> </urn3:postalAddress> </urn2:creditorAgent> <urn2:creditor> <urn3:name xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">cred</urn3:name> <urn3:postalAddress xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7"> <urn3:postCode>4502</urn3:postCode> <urn3:townName>test</urn3:townName> <urn3:countrySubDivision>test</urn3:countrySubDivision> <urn3:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn3:country> </urn3:postalAddress> </urn2:creditor> <urn2:creditorAccount> <urn3:identification xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">${Properties#CreditAccountNumber}</urn3:identification> <urn3:currency xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">${Properties#CreditorCurrency}</urn3:currency> </urn2:creditorAccount> <urn2:ultimateCreditor> <urn3:name xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">cred</urn3:name> </urn2:ultimateCreditor> </urn1:transaction> <urn1:standingOrderType>PERIODIC</urn1:standingOrderType> </urn:standingOrder> </urn:standingOrderCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

declare namespace urn='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5'; //urn:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/urn:standingOrderKey[1]/urn2:agreementId[1]}</urn1:agreementId> </urn1:standingOrderKey> <urn1:bankEmployeeInitiated>false</urn1:bankEmployeeInitiated> <urn1:filterByOrgUnit>false</urn1:filterByOrgUnit> </urn:searchCriteria> <urn:pagingElement> <urn2:startIndex>0</urn2:startIndex> <urn2:pageSize>100</urn2:pageSize> </urn:pagingElement> </urn:standingOrderSearch> </urn:standingOrderSearchRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: SO Reject

con:config.con:query: select * from STOH_AGREEMENT where AGREEMENTID = '${SO Create#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5'; declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementId[1]}'
